query:
INSERT INTO tools (name, description, category, url, pricingModel, features, useCase, tags, status, tierRequired) VALUES
('Fireflies.ai', 'AI meeting assistant for collaboration and topic tracking. Transcribes meetings, runs sentiment analysis, tracks topics, and creates shareable soundbites.', 'Meeting Notes', 'https://fireflies.ai', 'Freemium', '["Automatic transcription", "Sentiment analysis", "Topic tracking", "Soundbites creation", "AskFred AI", "HubSpot integration", "Salesforce integration", "Slack integration"]', 'Record and transcribe meetings across Zoom, Meet, Teams, Webex. Extract action items, track topics, and share meeting insights with teams.', '["AI", "Meeting Notes", "Transcription", "Collaboration", "Sales", "Customer Success"]', 'approved', 'free'),
('Granola', 'AI notepad that combines human and AI notes. Transcribes meetings while you take manual notes, then enhances them with AI-powered context from the transcript.', 'Meeting Notes', 'https://www.granola.ai', 'Freemium', '["Live notepad", "AI transcription", "Context enhancement", "Custom templates", "iPhone app", "Notion integration", "HubSpot integration", "Slack integration"]', 'Take notes during meetings and let AI fill in the details. Works with all video conferencing tools by capturing audio from your device.', '["AI", "Meeting Notes", "Productivity", "Transcription"]', 'approved', 'free'),
('Avoma', 'Conversation analytics platform for sales and customer success teams. Tracks filler words, monologues, talk-to-listen ratios, and competitive mentions.', 'Meeting Notes', 'https://www.avoma.com', 'Paid', '["Conversation analytics", "Filler word tracking", "Monologue detection", "Talk-to-listen ratio", "Competitive tracking", "AI scoring", "CRM integration", "Coaching tools"]', 'Improve sales calls and customer interviews with deep conversation analytics. Perfect for coaching sales teams and tracking competitive positioning.', '["AI", "Meeting Notes", "Sales", "Analytics", "Coaching", "CRM"]', 'approved', 'starter'),
('tl;dv', 'AI-powered meeting search and reporting tool. Generate reports from multiple meetings and search across all transcripts with natural language queries.', 'Meeting Notes', 'https://tldv.io', 'Freemium', '["AI-powered search", "Multi-meeting reports", "Speaker insights", "Video clips", "Timestamp notes", "CRM integration", "Slack integration"]', 'Search across all meeting transcripts, create recurring reports, and share video clips. Great for teams who need to find information across many meetings.', '["AI", "Meeting Notes", "Search", "Reporting", "Collaboration"]', 'approved', 'free'),
('Krisp', 'AI noise cancellation and transcription tool. Improves audio quality in real-time and transcribes meetings without bots joining calls.', 'Meeting Notes', 'https://krisp.ai', 'Freemium', '["AI noise cancellation", "Accent localization", "Transcription", "No meeting bots", "Works offline", "Local processing"]', 'Remove background noise, music, and chatter from calls. Works with any conferencing tool by processing audio locally on your computer.', '["AI", "Audio", "Meeting Notes", "Productivity", "Transcription"]', 'approved', 'free')
